sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import Home from "./Home"; import './App.css'; import Navigation from './Navigation'; import axios from 'axios'; const AddPurchase = () => { const [order, setOrder] = useState({name: "", lastName:"", country:"", city:"" , service:"", price: "", note: "", date: "", error: false}) const handleChange = (event) => { const {name,value} = event.target console.log(name) console.log(value) setOrder({...order, [name] : value}) } const {name, lastName, country, city, service, price, error, date} = order const clickSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log(event.target.value) console.log(name) console.log(lastName) const isValid = Boolean(order.name && order.lastName && order.country) console.log(isValid) if(name === '' || lastName === '' || price === '' || country === '' || city === ''){ setOrder({...order, error: true, errorMsg:'horrible'}) console.log(error) console.log(order) } axios.post('http://localhost:3001/createOrder', order) .then(data => { if(data.error) { setOrder({...order, error: true, success:false}) console.log(data.error) } }) setOrder({ ...order, name:'', lastName:'', country:'', city:'', service: '', price:'', note: '', date:'', error: '', errorMsg: '', success:true, }); }; const showError = () => (
{order.errorMsg}
); return (
{console.log(error)} {showError()}
